column4: hey guys... is anyone having issues with synatic?  this has been happening since release... system/preferences/synapitc..nothing ..system freeze...ctrl+alt+F1.. killall synaptic   ..restart gdm... I can then get into synaptic ...it is inconsistently happenind
also  I have already tried removing  /var/cache/apt/pkgcache.bin and srcpkgcache.bin to no avail
The entire GUI freezes, and does killing synaptic not unfreeze the GUI?
yes but I have to move into text console to kill synaptic  I cant open terminal in gnome
